page.title: 08MINCINGFIELD FARM-FUTURES
page.content: This farmer was optimistic about the future. He said that farmers must become more flexible and be prepared for change. He pointed out that farming has improved the appearence of the area, because without farming the scene would quickly revert to scrub. This farmer, like many others today, is becoming more aware of the ecological and environmental aspects of farming. "Farmers are having to listen to public opinion and take appropriate action. Farming will need to become much more aware of it role as a provider of recreational opportunites in the countryside."
